CustomField.description: Difference between Net Total price and the Net Cost of Sale, Sublease and Operations line items Rental, Insurance, Consumable, Carry-On, Bundled Sale items are NULL Subrental, Ops, Sale are NetPrice less Total Cost
CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(SBQQ__PricingMethod__c) = "List", NULL, SBQQ__NetPrice__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c - CASE(Trans_Category__c, "Sale", IF( SBQQ__Bundled__c = FALSE, Total_Cost_of_Non_Rental__c , NULL) , "Rental", NULL , "Rental Cost", NULL, Total_Cost_of_Non_Rental__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Difference between Net Total price and the Net Cost of Sale, SubLease and Operations line items
CustomField.label: Margin Amount
